\'Material Weekdays Buttons Demo\'
Sample app that demonstrates various use of the \'Weekdays Buttons Bar\' Library.

\'Weekdays Buttons Bar\' is an Android library that makes it easy to integrate weekdays selection in your layout. It will attach itself to a provided layout R.id in your xml file that can be a ViewStub or a RecyclerView.

XML
ViewStub
android:id=\"@+id/weekdays_stub\"
android:layout_width=\"match_parent\"
android:layout_height=\"?actionBarSize\"

 JAVA
new WeekdaysDataSource(this, R.id.weekdays_stub) .start([Selection Callback]);

Library is designed by Harald Sigmond
